title: 新约 - 约翰福音(John) - 第 15 章
subTitle: 新约 -- 约翰福音(John) -- 第 15 章 ( 本篇共有 21 章 )

lineList.en: I am the true vine, and my Father is the husbandman.
lineList.cn: 我是真葡萄树，我父是栽培的人。

lineList.en: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away: and every branch that beareth fruit, he purgeth it, that it may bring forth more fruit.
lineList.cn: 凡属我不结果子的枝子，他就剪去。凡结果子的，

lineList.en: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you.
lineList.cn: 现在你们因我讲给你们的道，已经乾净了。

lineList.en: Abide in me, and I in you. As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself, except it abide in the vine; no more can ye, except ye abide in me.
lineList.cn: 你们要常在我里面，我也常在你们里面。枝子若不常在葡萄树上，自己就不能结果子。你们若不常在我里面，也是这样。

lineList.en: I am the vine, ye are the branches: He that abideth in me, and I in him, the same bringeth forth much fruit: for without me ye can do nothing.
lineList.cn: 我是葡萄树，你们是枝子。常在我里面的，我也常在他里面，这人就多结果子。因为离了我，你们就不能作什么。

lineList.en: If a man abide not in me, he is cast forth as a branch, and is withered; and men gather them, and cast them into the fire, and they are burned.
lineList.cn: 人若不常在我里面，就像枝子丢在外面枯乾，人拾起来，扔在火里烧了。

lineList.en: If ye abide in me, and my words abide in you, ye shall ask what ye will, and it shall be done unto you.
lineList.cn: 你们若常在我里面，我的话也常在你们里面，凡你们所愿意的，祈求就给你们成就。

lineList.en: Herein is my Father glorified, that ye bear much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
lineList.cn: 你们多结果子，我父就因此得荣耀，你们也就是我的门徒了。

lineList.en: As the Father hath loved me, so have I loved you: continue ye in my love.
lineList.cn: 我爱你们，正如父爱我一样。你们要常在我的爱里。

lineList.en: If ye keep my commandments, ye shall abide in my love; even as I have kept my Father's commandments, and abide in his love.
lineList.cn: 你们若遵守我的命令，就常在我的爱里。正如我遵守了我父的命令，常在他的爱里。

lineList.en: These things have I spoken unto you, that my joy might remain in you, and that your joy might be full.
lineList.cn: 这些事我已经对你们说了，是要叫我的喜乐，存在你们心里，并叫你们的喜乐可以满足。

lineList.en: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.
lineList.cn: 你们要彼此相爱，像我爱你们一样，这就是我的命令。

lineList.en: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
lineList.cn: 人为朋友舍命，人的爱心没有比这个更大的。

lineList.en: Ye are my friends, if ye do whatsoever I command you.
lineList.cn: 你们若遵行我所吩付的，就是我的朋友了。

lineList.en: Henceforth I call you not servants; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth: but I have called you friends; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you.
lineList.cn: 以后我不再称你们为仆人。因仆人不知道主人所作的事。我乃称你们为朋友。因我从我父所听见的。已经都告诉你们了。

lineList.en: Ye have not chosen me, but I have chosen you, and ordained you, that ye should go and bring forth fruit, and that your fruit should remain: that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name, he may give it you.
lineList.cn: 不是你们拣选了我，是我拣选了你们，并且分派你们去结果子，叫你们的果子长存。使你们奉我的名，无论向父求什么，他就赐给你们。

lineList.en: These things I command you, that ye love one another.
lineList.cn: 我这样吩咐你们，是要叫你们彼此相爱。

lineList.en: If the world hate you, ye know that it hated me before it hated you.
lineList.cn: 世人若恨你们，你们知道（或作该知道）恨你们以先，已经恨我了。

lineList.en: If ye were of the world, the world would love his own: but because ye are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hateth you.
lineList.cn: 你们若属世界，世界必爱属自己的。只因你们不属世界。乃是我从世界拣选了你们，所以世界就恨你们。

lineList.en: Remember the word that I said unto you, The servant is not greater than his lord. If they have persecuted me, they will also persecute you; if they have kept my saying, they will keep yours also.
lineList.cn: 你们要记念我从前对你们所说的话，仆人不能大于主人。他们若逼迫了我，也要逼迫你们。若遵守了我的话，也要遵守你们的话。

lineList.en: But all these things will they do unto you for my name's sake, because they know not him that sent me.
lineList.cn: 但他们因我的名，要向你们行这一切的事，因为他们不认识那差我来的。

lineList.en: If I had not come and spoken unto them, they had not had sin: but now they have no cloak for their sin.
lineList.cn: 我若没有来教训他们，他们就没有罪。但如今他们的罪无可推诿了。

lineList.en: He that hateth me hateth my Father also.
lineList.cn: 恨我的，也恨我的父。

lineList.en: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did, they had not had sin: but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father.
lineList.cn: 我若没有在他们中间行过别人未曾行的事，他们就没有罪。但如今连我与我的父，他们也看见也恨恶了。

lineList.en: But this cometh to pass, that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law, They hated me without a cause.
lineList.cn: 这要应验他们律法上所写的话说，他们无故恨我。

lineList.en: But when the Comforter is come, whom I will send unto you from the Father, even the Spirit of truth, which proceedeth from the Father, he shall testify of me:
lineList.cn: 但我要从父那里差保惠师来，就是从父出来真里的圣灵。他来了，就要为我作见证。

lineList.en: And ye also shall bear witness, because ye have been with me from the beginning.
lineList.cn: 你们也要作见证，因为你们从起头就与我同在。
